renderKickstart

public java.lang.String renderKickstart(java.lang.String host,
                                        KickstartData data)
Render the kickstart using cobbler and return the contents with the Cobbler host search/replaced.

Parameters:
host - the host to force into the ks file. searches and replaces all instances of the Cobbler Host with whatever you pass in. Use with Proxies.
data - the KickstartData
Returns:
the rendered kickstart contents

Parameters:

url - The url to fetch

the rendered kickstart contents
